author: Holman W. Jenkins, Jr.
title: The Post Office and Trump’s Culture War
text:
Like dwellers in “Mister Rogers’ Neighborhood,” where everybody gets along, both Donald Trump and his critics can be correct when it comes to the country’s overdue argument about postal subsidies.
Mr. Trump is right: The post office can be said to be subsidizing Amazon because the U.S. Postal Service subsidizes business generally, and ultimately is subsidized by the taxpayer to do so. Don’t let post-office propagandists buffalo you. 
...
